changeSet.comment: Fill the table "events" with test data
changeSet.sql: WITH series AS( SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 20000) sery ), count_series AS( SELECT COUNT(*) AS quantity FROM series ) INSERT INTO events(topic, description, organizer, event_date, place) SELECT CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 THEN 'Daily meeting №' || s.sery::VARCHAR WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 THEN 'VK Fest №' || s.sery::VARCHAR WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'Sensation №' || s.sery::VARCHAR WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN 'UEFA Champions League №' || s.sery::VARCHAR ELSE 'Valentine Day' || s.sery::VARCHAR END, CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 THEN 'Team meeting to discuss the previous day`s work' WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 THEN 'One of the most popular and largest open-air festivals in the country' WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'An annual electronic music festival' WHEN s.sery % 2 = 0 THEN 'An annual club football competition contested by top-division European clubs' ELSE 'The day when lovers express their affection with greetings and gifts' END, 'organizer №' || FLOOR((random() * ((cs.quantity) / 100 - 1) + 1)), TO_TIMESTAMP(random() * ((1688588880) - 1638088880) + 1638088880), 'place' || FLOOR((random() * ((cs.quantity) / 100 - 1) + 1)) FROM series s, count_series cs
